title: How to Make a Cream Cheese Crab Dip

steps.headline: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl.
steps.description: Add the scallions and seasonings as needed or to taste. Be sure not to add too much of said ingredients, as this will overwhelm the other tastes. Blend evenly, making sure that the mixture is consistent and not too lumpy.

steps.headline: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or tin foil and put it in the refrigerator until firm (usually thirty minutes to an hour).
steps.description: Do not put it in the freezer.

steps.headline: Make the firm paste into a ball and roll in chopped almonds.
steps.description: Set on a plate surrounded with crackers.

steps.headline: Dig in, because you are finished!

text: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl. Add the scallions and seasonings as needed or to taste. Be sure not to add too much of said ingredients, as this will overwhelm the other tastes. Blend evenly, making sure that the mixture is consistent and not too lumpy. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or tin foil and put it in the refrigerator until firm (usually thirty minutes to an hour). Do not put it in the freezer. Make the firm paste into a ball and roll in chopped almonds. Set on a plate surrounded with crackers. Dig in, because you are finished!
